text: Kim Jong-suk(김정숙, December 24, 1917 – September 22, 1949) was a Korean independence activist, and communist politician. She was the first wife of North Korean President Kim Il-sung, and the mother of Kim Jong-Il, North Korean Great Leader. ==References== ==Other websites== *"Kim Jong Suk Biography" (PDF) *로동신문 - 김정숙,전세계녀성들의 귀감 *13. 항일의 녀성영웅 김정숙녀사께서 Category:1917 births Category:1949 deaths Category:North Korean politicians
title: Kim Jong-suk
